rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0001
rows.name: Based on what the innkeeper told me...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently there's going
to be a big sale
at the Avaritia Bazaar today.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0003
rows.name:
You can get 50% to 90% off
on just about anything, they say.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0004
rows.name: We can't afford to miss this chance.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0005
rows.name:
Bargain hunting days
can be so thrilling!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0006
rows.name:
Let's hope we find
something worthwhile.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0007
rows.name:
I want accessories.
Let's go to the accessory shop.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0008
rows.name:
Say, shopkeeper,
do you have any
fashionable accessories?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0009
rows.name: Of course I do! Indeed I do!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0010
rows.name:
I have a necklace made
from scarlet mushrooms.
Yours for just 5000G!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0011
rows.name:
Normally costs 10,000G,
but today it's a special bargain price!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0012
rows.name:
I see...
This is suspiciously inexpensive...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0013
rows.name:
And while it may be befitting of a
Nopon, we do not like how it may
be eaten at a moment's notice.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0014
rows.name:
I desire accessories
of refinement and purity.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0015
rows.name: Very well, on to the next shop!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0016
rows.name:
This shop has quite
an intriguing selection.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0017
rows.name: You have excellent taste, customer!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0018
rows.name:
We take salvaged
materials and craft them
into unique accessories here.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0019
rows.name:
I see.
So everything is handmade.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0020
rows.name:
Shopkeeper,
can you show me the most
expensive item in your store?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0021
rows.name:
Meh-meh!
This right here!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0022
rows.name:
This exquisite piece
is crafted from precious ore
that was salvaged in Gula!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0023
rows.name:
Ah!
What a magnificent piece!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0024
rows.name: This necklace...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0025
rows.name: Homura, this would look perfect on you!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0026
rows.name: Kagutsuchi, this would surely suit you!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0101
rows.name: Huh? Me?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0102
rows.name: I'm not worthy of something so fine...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0103
rows.name: Nonsense! You are a magnificent woman!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0104
rows.name:
If you wear this necklace,
you will shine many times more
beautifully than before.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0105
rows.name:
Really? You think so?
But...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0106
rows.name: Listen, Homura.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0107
rows.name:
If you become my lover,
I will give you
this necklace as a present.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0108
rows.name: What do you say?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0109
rows.name:
Eh? ...Lover?
Me?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0110
rows.name:
That's right.
You want this necklace, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0111
rows.name: I must decline.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0112
rows.name: What!?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0201
rows.name: My, how lovely...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0202
rows.name:
It's very dainty and beautiful.
I admit, it would suit me well.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0203
rows.name:
What on earth are you thinking,
offering such an expensive gift?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0204
rows.name: Kagutsuchi, your beauty is genuine.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0205
rows.name: ...W-where did that come from!?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0206
rows.name:
You must be making
extraordinary efforts.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0207
rows.name: Well, nothing extraordinary...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0208
rows.name:
No need to elaborate!
I comprehend it all...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0209
rows.name:
It's all so you can become
my lover, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0210
rows.name:
Absolutely not!
You're completely mistaken.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0211
rows.name: What!?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0301
rows.name: I never imagined I would be rejected...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0302
rows.name:
Nevertheless, I shall not
admit defeat so easily...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0303
rows.name:
I shall purchase the necklace
for my future lover...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0304
rows.name:
Merchant,
what is the price of this necklace?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0305
rows.name:
My my,
thank you for deciding to buy!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0306
rows.name: That'll be precisely 430,000G!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0308
rows.name:
Let me see...
Isn't today the bargain day?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0309
rows.name: Surely you'll offer a 90% discount?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0310
rows.name:
43,000G? No way!
This is a premium item,
so it's not part of the sale...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0311
rows.name:
How absurd!!
This is exactly why
I despise cheapskates...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0312
rows.name: Enough, let's go home!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0401
rows.name: What a letdown...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0402
rows.name:
So... I think I can guess,
but what exactly is your dream, Rinne?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0403
rows.name:
Hey... I can mostly guess,
but what is Rinne's dream?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0404
rows.name:
I've a hunch already, but would you
mind telling us about what is your
dream, Rinne?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0405
rows.name:
Honestly...
I'm not sure I want to know,
but what's this dream of yours, Rinne?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0406
rows.name: Well asked!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0407
rows.name:
To have fun tea parties
with cute girls!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0408
rows.name:
For that purpose, I need to gather
cute girls as lovers
and create a harem.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0410
rows.name:
I shall let no hardship stand
in my way to achieve this goal!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0411
rows.name:
Fear not, Homura, Kagutsuchi,
Nia, Meleph, Hana, Saika too...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0412
rows.name:
I plan to invite everyone
to my harem as lovers!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0415
rows.name:
However, what I learned today is
that getting someone to be my lover
is not easy.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0416
rows.name:
Regardless of how arduous the journey,
I shall never surrender!!
